message: I hate the topic, but I know people are going to jump on the lack of a capital P in the group name... Might be better to change sooner (if possible).
Oops, good call. I forget out [P]icky that can be.
Actually, I don't pay much attention to the capital p. I searched and did not find a Wordpress group so I started one <grin>. I am looking for others who have Multi-site/BuddyPress setups.

That's exactly why I started this one. I didn't find one when I first searched and I knew it would be a topic I'll end up on anyway. Can't wait till a few more users make it onto the service. It seems to be growing quickly.
@raywaldo I have a few multisite installations with buddypress enabled
@raywaldo I have created groups for Multisite and buddypress. Could you please join here:https://convore.com/wordpress-multisite/ and https://convore.com/buddypress/
